ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Girls just wanna have fun .....
ygData.msgSnippet: the price on crystalline blades (11 38) has come down a lot, you may be able to pick one up for 600pp or a little more.  it s not a bad weapon and you will
ygData.messageBody:
the price on crystalline blades (11 38) has come down a lot, you may be able
to pick one up for 600pp or a little more. it's not a bad weapon and you
will feel like you are doing some better damage, if a bit slower. there is
also the brazen brass kilij (11 35) which has a better ratio, but looks like
a normal scimitar (yuk). the short sword look of the crys blade isn't great
but it beats the scimitar. it's been a long time but i am fairly sure the
crys blade is primary only, as is the claws and staff of writhing.

Shada Powa, L50 Wood Elf Bard
Tyria Sarkin, L47 High Elf Wizard
<Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server

>
> Hopefully there'll be something within my price range (which is
> actually very low at the mo after buying the stones to get the new
> armour!!!)
>
